A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie. But a terrible “Star Wars” saga movie. Someone needed to think about the DNA of “Star Wars” first—which has to do with light vs. dark\, not just good vs. evil—related but distinct concepts. This film has plenty of the latter\, but little of the former. And Benicio del Toro’s character seemingly exists to drive that point home. A decent movie\, but a betrayal of the themes that make “Star Wars” “Star Wars.”
